name: a woman’s worth
content: You could buy me diamonds
You could buy me pearls
Take me on a cruise around the world
Baby you know I'm worth it
Make love tenderly to last and last
Baby you know I'm worth it
Wanna please wanna keep
Wanna treat your woman right
Not just told but to show that you know
She is worth your time
You will lose if you choose to
Refuse to put her first
She will if she can't find a man
Who knows her worth mhmn
Cuz a real man knows
A real woman when he sees her
And a real woman knows
And a real woman knows
A real man always comes first
Mhmn mhmn mhmn mhmn
If you treat me fairly
I'll give you all my goods
Treat you like a real woman should
Baby I know you're worth it
Baby I know you're worth it
She rolls the mile makes you smile
All the while being true
Don't take for granted the passion
That she has for you
You will lose if you choose
To refuse to put her first
She will if she can't find
A man who knows her worth oh
